page.title: 11Southampton Water Bailiff
page.content: We went to the{River Test}for the day to study nature and interview Mr Vic Foot, the water bailiff. Police Constable Stenton was with him on a metal bridge over the river and they told us they work closely together. They are good friends. "We are always trying to keep off the undesirable elements. The people who trespass, cause a nuisance to the fishermen and damage to the river." "The worst problem is{poaching}. We see some pretty nasty things done to fish with great hooks, and also traps. We've had some adventures alright!" Vic Foot has been water bailiff for{ {43 years}. There are{Trout,Salmon,Eels in the river. It's very expensive to fish here with a licence. What was the best thing about his job? "All of it really. I like the freedom and the river itself is very special."
